extension.summary: Pairing / Authorization Tool for use with any build.
extension.description: This tool allows you to Pair your device with various pairing sites such as Openload as well as Authorize your Real Debrid account for URLResolver and/or ResolveURL. It is NOT compatible with Firesticks!
extension.disclaimer: For support, join Blamo's Tech Support group on Telegram: [B][COLOR orange]https://t.me/joinchat/GoeWM1HdefcaxpGLsLd2Ag [/COLOR][/B]
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
